Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: spoiled_rotten22
Reviews.Content: Just got the camera today. Already took a ton of pictures, and I love it. It's by far the best camera I have had so far. It came on time and is exactly what was advertised. If I have any problems with it, of course, I will update.

Reviews.Title: Samsung EC-ST700 Digital Camera with 16 MP, 5x Optical Zoom and Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: jim dhaliwal
Reviews.Content: I like.The camera is great, excellent technology I like how compact it is, the battery life is very long, the only thing I noticed is that it has a delay in orders on the digital display, but the update is easily correctable. The seller fulfilled as promised and delivered on the agreed date. Definitely give it five stars best camera I ever bought.

Reviews.Title: me encanta
Reviews.Author: franklin pereira
Reviews.Content: excelente cámara, fácil de manejar la recomiendo para toda aquella que persona que le gusta lo bueno tiene una gran resolucion
